body:
I was trying to make an alt coin from bitcoin-0.10.0 fork, for educational project
Source code was obtained from here: https://bitcoin.org/bin/bitcoin-core-0.10.0/

**Actual compile error for make:**
```
Making all in src
make[1]: Entering directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src'
make[2]: Entering directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src'
make[3]: Entering directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src/secp256k1'
make[3]: Leaving directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src/secp256k1'
  CXX      qt/qt_srmcoin_qt-srmcoin.o
In file included from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtGui/qwindowdefs.h:37:0,
                 from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtWidgets/qwidget.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtWidgets/qframe.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtWidgets/qlabel.h:37,
                 from /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtWidgets/QLabel:1,
                 from qt/srmcoingui.h:14,
                 from qt/srmcoin.cpp:9:
/usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/qt5/QtCore/qglobal.h:1067:4: error: #error "You must build your code with position independent code if Qt was built with -reduce-relocations. " "Compile your code with -fPIC (-fPIE is not enough)."
 #  error "You must build your code with position independent code if Qt was built with -reduce-relocations. "\
    ^
Makefile:5448: recipe for target 'qt/qt_srmcoin_qt-srmcoin.o' failed
make[2]: *** [qt/qt_srmcoin_qt-srmcoin.o] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src'
Makefile:6228: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/cjhackerz/Documents/Research/Blockchain/srmcoin/src'
Makefile:569: recipe for target 'all-recursive' failed
make: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
```
_I have been following this guide http://dillingers.com/blog/2015/04/18/how-to-make-an-altcoin/ as reference._

**I don't why it is throwing error like this and I never touched those qt gui based cpp files, I just renamed them with help of linux commands.**
title: bitcoin-0.10.0 qt5 compile error: -reduce-relocations
